full_summary:
================================

**Tender Opportunity Announcement: Mooring Equipment Standing Offer**

**Notice Number:** FW005-240001 Équipement d’amarrage OCIM
**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Solicitation Number:** WS4599078166
**Publication Date:** June 4, 2024
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** July 10, 2024, 2:00 PM (EDT)

**Background**
------------

As part of its procurement plans, Canada requires a Standing Offer for the supply of Mooring Equipment on an as and when requested basis for the Canadian Coast Guard and the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The offer will be used to provide Mooring Equipment to Canadian Coast Guard and the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada for their ongoing operations.

**Terms and Conditions**
-----------------------

All bids must be submitted electronically by July 10, 2024, at 2:00 PM (EDT). Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Selection Criteria**
--------------------

The Standing Offer will be awarded based on the Lowest Price criterion.

**Important Documents and Supporting Materials**
-------------------------------------------

It is the bidder's responsibility to review the following documents:

- Standing Offer terms and conditions
- Terms of Reference
- Technical specifications

**Bidder's Responsibilities**
---------------------------

Before submitting your bid, ensure you have reviewed all necessary requirements, including supporting documents and compliance with the terms and conditions of the offer.

**Contact Information**
-------------------------

Melanie Perrin, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Phone: N/A
Email: [melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Attachments: N/A

**Notice Link**
----------------

The full notice can be consulted at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19911622?extsite=MTk5MTE2MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note:
- I kept the detailed list in a separate section ( **Attachments** ) even though it's empty.
- I added " as and when requested basis" , this detail was clear, but I did not see it and assumed it was like a bias.
